section1.des:
Various pollutants are concentrated in upstream areas, and water quality deterioration
such as green algae, is repeatedly occurring.
However, it is difficult to respond in real time and select efficient management areas
using existing manual methods..

section2.des1:
We are solving environmental pollution problems through intensive

type1.title: Land cover map
type1.des1:
Automatically classify land use
status and predict potential contamination.
type1.des2: K-AQUAS analyzes satellite images using artificial intelligence (AI) and automatically classifies the land in the target area into 13 types, including rice paddies, fields, mountains, and residential areas.
type1.des3: These classification results are used to quantify the amount of pollution generated, and are calculated based on the Ministry of Environment's Total Pollution Load Management Technical Guidelines.

type2.title: Contamination source object detection
type2.des1:
Automatically detects sources of
contamination in drone-captured images.
type2.des2:
K-AQUAS automatically recognizes and detects the location of major pollutants, such as compost and livestock waste,
based on high-quality images and videos
collected by drones. Detected pollutants are displayed along
with location coordinates and altitude information,
along with a bounding box.
type2.des3:
The detected data is visualized on the administrator screen to support on-site inspection and response
decision making.

type3.title: Priority management area management
type3.des1:
We derive priority management
areas based on data.
type3.des2:
Managing all areas by the same standards is inefficient.
K-AQUAS analyzes various environmental data to automatically
select areas in urgent need of pollution control.
type3.des3:
The algorithm uses TOPSIS to perform
a comprehensive evaluation by assigning weights
to each major factor, such as precipitation, altitude, and distance from rivers.

type4.title: Provides various web services
type4.des1:
We provide you with data at
a glance and easy to check.
type4.des2:
K-AQUAS visualizes complex data
in various forms, including maps, graphs, and tables, so that everyone from field
workers to managers can conveniently utilize it
type4.des3:
K-AQUAS provides satellite and drone data and analysis results
as a dashboard and map-based service.
You can check land cover maps, pollution source distribution,
and priority management areas at a glance, and support faster
and more accurate decision-making through data comparison by period and customized management tools
